languages.text: {n}Кибелла негромко смеется.{/n} "Время. Время течет, меняя все на пути. Не пора ли перестать цепляться за прошлое и позволить тому, что должно, взять свое?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла негромко смеется.{/n} "Время. Время течет, меняя все на своем пути столь же неуклонно, как ручей высекает в скале русло. Не пора ли перестать цепляться за прошлое и позволить тому, что должно, взять свое?"

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла негромко смеется.{/n} "Время. Время течет, меняя все на пути. Не пора ли перестать цепляться за прошлое и позволить тому, что должно, взять свое?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Is it not time we stopped clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course?"
{n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Is it not time we stopped clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course?"
{n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."
{n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."
{n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."
{n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lacht leicht auf.{/n} "Zeit. Die Zeit fließt weiter und verändert alles, was sie berührt. Das ist unsere Gelegenheit, uns nicht mehr an die Vergangenheit zu klammern, sondern das Unvermeidliche seinen Lauf nehmen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lacht leicht auf.{/n} "Zeit. Die Zeit fließt weiter und verändert alles, was sie berührt. Das ist unsere Gelegenheit, uns nicht mehr an die Vergangenheit zu klammern, sondern das Unvermeidliche seinen Lauf nehmen zu lassen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah deja escapar una risa suave.{/n} «Tiempo. El tiempo fluye, cambiando todo lo que toca. Esta es nuestra oportunidad de dejar de aferrarnos al pasado y dejar que lo inevitable siga su curso».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah deja escapar una risa suave.{/n} «Tiempo. El tiempo fluye, cambiando todo lo que toca. Esta es nuestra oportunidad de dejar de aferrarnos al pasado y dejar que lo inevitable siga su curso».

languages.text: {n}キベラが柔らかい笑い声をあげる。{/n}「時間。時は流れ続け、触れるものをすべて変えていく。今こそ、過去に執着するのをやめて、いつ全の流れに身を任せるタイミングよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが柔らかい笑い声をあげる。{/n}「時間。時は流れ続け、触れるものをすべて変えていく。今こそ、過去に執着するのをやめて、いつ全の流れに身を任せるタイミングよ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈发出了柔和的笑声。{/n}“时间啊，时间不断流逝，改变着它触碰到的一切。我们应该借着这个机会放开过去，让不可避免的事情顺其自然地发生。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈发出了柔和的笑声。{/n}“时间啊，时间不断流逝，改变着它触碰到的一切。我们应该借着这个机会放开过去，让不可避免的事情顺其自然地发生。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah laisse échapper un petit rire.{/n} « Le temps. Le temps s'écoule et change tout ce qu'il touche. L'heure est venue d'oublier le passé et de laisser l'inévitable se produire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah laisse échapper un petit rire.{/n} « Le temps. Le temps s'écoule et change tout ce qu'il touche. L'heure est venue d'oublier le passé et de laisser l'inévitable se produire. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, hafif bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Zaman... Zaman akıp gidiyor, dokunduğu her şeyi değiştiriyor. Geçmişe takılıp kalmaya bir son vererek kaçınılmaz olanı akışına bırakma fırsatı artık elimizde."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a soft laugh.{/n} "Time. Time flows on, changing everything it touches. Now is our chance to stop clinging to the past and let the inevitable take its course."
